verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I lift up my hands though my strength is gone
i lift up my hands though my trials surround me
when i lift up my hands i begin to feel
the anointing that makes me sing
when i lift up my hands i begin to feel the fire
when i lift up my hands my burdens they leave
new strength you give to me
all things are possible, all things are possible
when i lift up my hands
